All About Elite Homes

Crafting Dreams, Building Futures

Elite Homes, a leading construction company in Goa, has 6 years of industry experience. It all began in 2017 when Mohammad Juned Killedar, Saddam Hussain Kuknoor, and Syed Furqanul Haque, launched their construction business as a small-scale service providers. Through hard work and determination, the company transitioned to a sole proprietorship in the same year and was officially registered as Elite Homes. This family business follows a rich ancestral tradition in the construction industry. We hold an ISO certification, recognizing our commitment to international standards.

We are engaged in all construction activities such as Construction of Residential and Commercial Buildings, Developing of land and Real Estate activities, and land Trading.

We are dedicated to delivering exceptional and distinct finishes in every project we handle. Our track record proves our expertise in assembling the right experience. We also embrace modern technology and methods to ensure customer satisfaction and timely project delivery.

Why Choose Us?

When you choose Elite Homes, you're choosing a construction partner that excels in quality, backs its work with warranties, values punctuality, and maintains the financial strength required for a seamless construction journey. Your dream project is in capable hands with Elite Homes.

Quality

Our unwavering commitment to quality sets us apart. We don't compromise on the materials we use or the craftsmanship we provide. From foundation to finishing touches, we prioritize excellence, ensuring that every detail of your project is of the highest standard. Your satisfaction and the durability of our work are paramount.

Warranty

We stand behind our work with confidence. To offer you peace of mind, we provide warranties that demonstrate our belief in the longevity and quality of our construction. We're not just building for today; we're building for your future, and our warranty reflects our commitment to your long-term satisfaction.

Timely Delivery

We understand the significance of project schedules. Delays can be costly and inconvenient. Elite Homes has a proven track record of on-time delivery. We work diligently to ensure that your project is completed as promised. Our commitment to punctuality means you can plan with confidence.

Financial Stability

Financial stability is the bedrock of any construction project. With Elite Homes, you can be assured of a smooth and uninterrupted construction process. Our financial stability ensures that your project progresses without disruptions. You can trust us to manage resources efficiently and meet our financial obligations, creating a secure environment for your project's success.
